channel.title: Blog on Tanzil Zubair Bin Zaman
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Tanzil Zubair Bin Zaman

item.title: What goes into a Flutter app ( Part 1 )
item.description: Disclaimer This article is meant to be a starting point for people new to coding and trying their hand at Dart and Flutter, much as I was and did.

item.title: What goes into a Flutter app ( Part 2 )
item.description: Disclaimer This is Part 2 of a series of articles that explore and seek to provide newcomers with a high-level overview of what all the parts of an app consist of and do, so that they can hit the ground running.

item.title: What goes into a Flutter app ( Part 3 )
item.description: Disclaimer This is Part 3 and the final part of a series of articles that explore and seek to provide newcomers with a high-level overview of what all the parts of a Flutter app consist of and do, so that they can hit the ground running.

item.title: What goes into a Flutter app ( Part 4 )
item.description: Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores.
